entry.string: git config --global user.email jenkins@gosmartlog.com git config --global user.name jenkins git clone https://${BITBUCKET_USERNAME}:${BITBUCKET_PASSWORD}@bitbucket.org/smartlogtms/devops-deployment-stm2.5.git cd devops-deployment-stm2.5 sed -i 's+744004065806.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/smartlog-optimization.*+744004065806.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/smartlog-optimization@sha256:f6a6ec31febb224a996822c57468c43c001da478581f826343184c2e3acf8286+g' ./super-vrp/develop_v3/.argocd-source.yaml git add ./super-vrp/develop_v3/.argocd-source.yaml for file in ./super-vrp/develop_v3/deploy*.yaml; do sed -i "s/\(date:\s*\)'[^']*'/\1'1680665115'/" "$file";git add "$file";done
